title: Executive Order 7679-Amendment of Subdivision II, Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by paragraph Eighth, subdivision SECOND, section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 404), it is ordered that Subdivision II of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules be, and it is hereby, amended by adding thereto the following paragraph:
"4. Chief and two assistant chiefs of the Foreign Service Buildings Office."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7679-Amendment of Subdivision II, Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/210290
